lead_paragraph: The electronic key system was infiltrated and a ransom of about $1,800 was demanded, an example of a malicious and prevalent type of modern-day piracy.
snippet: The electronic key system was infiltrated and a ransom of about $1,800 was demanded, an example of a malicious and prevalent type of modern-day piracy....

headline.main: Hackers Use New Tactic at Austrian Hotel: Locking the Doors
headline.print_headline: Hackers Squeeze Hotel by Locking Doors
